transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I help you today?
Hi, I need help with a of issue.
To verify your identity, please provide your full name and date of birth.
My name is Brandon Wood and I was born on October 09, 1987.
Thank you, Brandon Wood. I've located your records. How can we assist you today?
I have been dealing with of for a few days.
Let me schedule an appointment to address your of.
Thank you, when is the earliest slot available?
I have an opening with Dr. Patel at 2 PM tomorrow. Does that work for you?
Great, you're now booked with Dr. Patel at 2 PM tomorrow. See you then!
